doc.title: Passion Play: The Messiah's Entry Into Jerusalem
doc.plot: Christ is here seen entering into Jerusalem. As He rides between the files of soldiers guarding the city entrance, He is followed by His disciples and a multitude of people of all ages who are waving palms and crying "Hosanna." Passing under one of the great archways leading to the city, where a Messianic demonstration was about to be made, a large number of people have joined the procession now seen passing on toward the scene of action.
